entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
